about.description: A passionate developer blending creativity and code to bring ideas to life. I love crafting functional, clean, and user-friendly experiences that feel as good as they look. Coming from a town rich in culture and beauty, I carry that same inspiration into my work - creating digital experiences that reflect the harmony and elegance they deserve.

experience.description: Had me engaging on technology daily, solving complex problems, and collaborating with talented teams to deliver high-quality software solutions

responsibilities: Developed and maintained responsive web applications
Configured Jenkins pipeline to minimize the build time
Established mobile-web communication bridge to support cross-platform interactions and device sync-up

experience.description: Gained hands-on experience in software development, contributing to real-world projects and collaborating with cross-functional teams

education.description: The place that brought like-minded friends together, laid foundation for our careers, and carved me who I am today

education.institution: Srivi Lions Matic Higher Secondary School
education.description: The place where I grew up, nurtured my imagination, fed my curiosity, and shaped my discipline

interests.title: Photography
interests.caption: Capturing moments through the lens
interests.summary: I love exploring the world through photography, capturing the beauty in everyday moments and landscapes.
interests.review: Photography has taught me to see details and compositions that directly influence my approach to UI/UX design. The patience and creativity required have made me a better developer.

accordions.title: Landscape Photography
accordions.content: My favorite type of photography, focusing on natural landscapes and outdoor scenes.

accordions.title: Street Photography
accordions.content: Documenting everyday life and human interactions in urban environments.

interests.title: Music Production
interests.caption: Creating melodies and beats
interests.summary: Music production allows me to express creativity in a different medium, creating electronic and ambient music.
interests.review: Music production has enhanced my understanding of patterns, timing, and user experience flow in web development.

accordions.title: Electronic Music
accordions.content: Creating electronic soundscapes and ambient tracks using various DAWs.

accordions.title: Sound Design
accordions.content: Experimenting with synthesizers and audio effects to create unique sounds.

interests.title: Rock Climbing
interests.caption: Conquering heights and challenges
interests.summary: Rock climbing teaches problem-solving, patience, and perseverance - skills that translate perfectly to coding.
interests.review: The problem-solving aspect of finding the right route up a wall mirrors the process of debugging code and finding elegant solutions.

accordions.title: Indoor Climbing
accordions.content: Regular training at indoor climbing gyms to build strength and technique.

accordions.title: Outdoor Adventures
accordions.content: Exploring natural rock formations and mountain ranges for climbing challenges.
